title: It’s finally over.
content: My last grade came in today. Cumalative GPA: 3.63. Not too special, but not bad for a guy who barely made it out of high school at all.
author: blank

comments.content: I don't know, James, 3.63 is pretty good! Congrats!
I'd agree. 3.63 is very good. Congratulations!

Congrats James! Best of luck as you begin your new career.

ChrisL

Congratulations, James! You are so smart. Best wishes.

Sharon

Better than I did James, and I'm a smart guy! - HA

Congrats welcome to the club.
